ul.li: If the background image is fixed with regard to the canvas, the image is placed relative to the canvas instead of the element.

body.p:
If statement above is passed, an oval button image should be placed in the lower right corner of the canvas. The rules applied are "body {background-image; url(ovalbbut.gif); background-attachment: fixed; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 100%100%}".
It is fixed with respect to the canvas, not with respect to this paragraph element. All other properties of this page should be UA-default. aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
